```{r}
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
sites <- read_excel("data/Neofitas_sites.xlsx", sheet = "sites")
neophytes <- read_excel("data/Neofitas_species.xlsx", sheet = "neophytes")
taxonomy <- read_excel("data/Neofitas_species.xlsx", sheet = "taxonomy")
```

```{r}
save(
  sites,neophytes,taxonomy,
  file="data/rawdata.RData"
)
```
